solution_line_template: On Tuesday, Nancy creates {monday_pots} clay pots * {multiplier_tuesday} = <<{monday_pots}*{multiplier_tuesday}={tuesday_pots}>>{tuesday_pots} clay plots.
So she created a combined total of {monday_pots} + {tuesday_pots} = <<{monday_pots}+{tuesday_pots}={monday_tuesday_total}>>{monday_tuesday_total} clay pots on Monday and Tuesday.

Subtracting this from the number of clay pots she ended the week with means she must have created {total_end_week} - {monday_tuesday_total} = <<{total_end_week}-{monday_tuesday_total}={wednesday_pots}>>{wednesday_pots} clay pots on Wednesday.
